techmeme.title: Apple SVP Greg Joswiak says "we have an exciting week of announcements ahead, starting on Monday morning"; rumors suggest new M4-powered Macs (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Concentric AI, which helps companies secure and track sensitive data, raised a $45M Series B, bringing its total funding to $67M (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Anthropic launches an analysis tool to help Claude write and run JavaScript code, perform calculations, and analyze data from files, in preview (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Nimble, which helps companies automate their warehouses using logistics robots, raised a $106M Series C led by FedEx at a $1B valuation (FinSMEs)
Apple adds an iMessage child safety feature in iOS 18.2 beta 1 in Australia that will let children report nudity material sent to them to Apple (Josh Taylor/The Guardian)
